name: Liquity
description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol built on Ethereum that allows you to draw interest-free loans against Ether via its LUSD stablecoin.

en.name: Liquity
en.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol built on Ethereum that allows you to draw interest-free loans against Ether via its LUSD stablecoin.

fr.name: Liquity
fr.description: Liquity est un protocole d'emprunt décentralisé basé sur Ethereum qui vous permet de contracter des prêts sans intérêt contre de l'Ether via son stablecoin LUSD.

es.name: Liquity
es.description: Liquity es un protocolo de préstamo descentralizado basado en Ethereum que le permite obtener préstamos sin intereses contra Ether a través de su moneda estable LUSD.

tr.name: Liquity
tr.description: Liquity, Ethereum üzerine inşa edilmiş ve LUSD stabilcoin'i aracılığıyla Ether'e karşı faizsiz krediler çekmenize izin veren merkezi olmayan bir borç alma protokolüdür.
